paragraph.heading: 1Add New Item - Web Service
paragraph.paragraph: The Web Service item is an empty class, named NEW_WEB_SERVICE, hosting only the bare essentials web service features. You may add any number of features to this class however by default they will not be exported. To add a 'Web Method' you must declare individual items with the WEB_METHOD_ATTRIBUTE. Please review the example below.
Please note that all those features exported as web methods must use the .NET basic types and not the Eiffel basic types else the feature will be un-callable via SOAP.
